info.description: The API for the ECom Website project

200.description: Delete role success or role isn't existed

description.example: Assign a permission to a role

delete.description: Deletes an existing review. Requires authentication.

parameters.name: reviewId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the review to delete

code.description: Response code indicating success or failure

message.description: Error message describing what went wrong

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission to delete this review

message.description: Error message describing what went wrong
Error message describing what went wrong

post.description: Creates a new order in the system

put.description: Updates the status of a specific item in an order. Requires ADMIN authority.

parameters.name: orderItemId
parameters.description: ID of the order item to update

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: New status for the order item

userId.description: ID of the user who placed the order

userName.description: Name of the user who placed the order

orderDate.description: Date and time when the order was placed

200.description: Lấy trạng thái đơn hàng thành công

500.description: Có lỗi khi lấy trạng thái đơn hàng

put.description: Cập nhật trạng thái đơn hàng

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: ID của đơn hàng cần cập nhật

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Trạng thái mới của đơn hàng

200.description: Cập nhật trạng thái đơn hàng thành công

parameters.description: ID của đơn hàng cần cập nhật

parameters.description: ID của đơn hàng cần xóa

post.description: Creates a payment order in the Zalopay payment gateway

get.description: Retrieves the status of a payment order from Zalopay

parameters.name: appTransId
parameters.description: Transaction ID of the payment order

post.description: Handles payment result callback from Zalopay. This endpoint is meant to be called by Zalopay's server, not by users.

mac.description: Message Authentication Code (MAC) for data verification
